.
(bad)
.
<p>(bad)</p>
.


copyright
.
(c) (C)
.
<p>© ©</p>
.


reserved
.
(r) (R)
.
<p>® ®</p>
.


trademark
.
(tm) (TM)
.
<p>™ ™</p>
.


paragraph
.
(p) (P)
.
<p>§ §</p>
.


plus-minus
.
+-5
.
<p>±5</p>
.


ellipsis
.
test.. test... test..... test?..... test!....
.
<p>test… test… test… test?.. test!..</p>
.


dupes
.
!!!!!! ???? ,,
.
<p>!!! ??? ,</p>
.


dashes
.
---markdownit --- super---

markdownit---awesome

abc ----

--markdownit -- super--

markdownit--awesome
.
<p>—markdownit — super—</p>
<p>markdownit—awesome</p>
<p>abc ----</p>
<p>–markdownit – super–</p>
<p>markdownit–awesome</p>
.


arrows
.
--> <-- <--> ==> <== <==>

==>markdownit <==> super<==

markdownit==>awesome<==>yay<==arrows

abc ----> <---- -->> <<-- ===> <<== <<==>>

-->markdownit <--> super<--

markdownit-->awesome<-->yay<--arrows
.
<p>→ ← ↔ ⇒ ⇐ ⇔</p>
<p>⇒markdownit ⇔ super⇐</p>
<p>markdownit⇒awesome⇔yay⇐arrows</p>
<p>abc ----&gt; &lt;---- --&gt;&gt; &lt;&lt;-- ===&gt; &lt;&lt;== &lt;&lt;==&gt;&gt;</p>
<p>→markdownit ↔ super←</p>
<p>markdownit→awesome↔yay←arrows</p>
.
